descriptionHtml:
This is my 3rd character from A Game of Thrones and this time I did Khal Drogo. Tell me what you think!

He is a Redguard and the save is level 1 right after the dragon attack.

Just place the esm in the folder located in My Documents > My Games > Skyrim > Saves and have fun!
 
And check out my other Game of Throne characters
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1520]Daenerys[/url] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1012]Jaime[/url] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=972]Eddard[/url]
author: twinpanic
